entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
